reviews:
Just got it in the mail today and is an authentic Carhartt sweater. Exact same one you'll find in the stores. I love how one post claims it's a knockoff simply because its cheaper Amazon.

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Absolutely perfect!! Exactly as described, great price and I will be ordering again! I have purchased the same identical item from a local store in the past for a much higher price and was beyond happy to find the same item online.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: These sweaters are carhartt knockoffs, and look very cheap. Asked for a refund multiple times and recieved nothing back..... What a waste of time.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: I love all my Carhartt gear, I have 8-10 hoodies, 7-8 long sleeve T’s, 10-12 short sleeve t’s and 3 jackets... my only complaint with this sweater is the picture makes it look considerably lighter then it is in person and I already have this dark blue.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Love this sweater for my husband, but it for much larger than regular sizes. Ordered a xl as he usually fits all xl’s but this was huge. Like it a whole size larger huge. The quality was great but just wish the size was more true to regular sizing. I would recommend sizing down.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess

product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: These sweaters are carhartt knockoffs, and look very cheap. Asked for a refund multiple times and recieved nothing back..... What a waste of time.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: I love all my Carhartt gear, I have 8-10 hoodies, 7-8 long sleeve T’s, 10-12 short sleeve t’s and 3 jackets... my only complaint with this sweater is the picture makes it look considerably lighter then it is in person and I already have this dark blue.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Love this sweater for my husband, but it for much larger than regular sizes. Ordered a xl as he usually fits all xl’s but this was huge. Like it a whole size larger huge. The quality was great but just wish the size was more true to regular sizing. I would recommend sizing down.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Fantastic sweatshirt. I purchased as a gift for my brother-in-law and he loved it. One thing to note is that the writing on the arm is actually a vibrant orange colour and not red as pictured. I actually prefer the orange with the blue/teal colour of the hoodie! It looks great
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Carhartt always fits a bit large. It came as expected. I saw the same one in Marks Work Warehouse for about the same price, only they didn't have his size in store.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews:
Just got it in the mail today and is an authentic Carhartt sweater. Exact same one you'll find in the stores. I love how one post claims it's a knockoff simply because its cheaper Amazon.

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Fantastic sweatshirt. I purchased as a gift for my brother-in-law and he loved it. One thing to note is that the writing on the arm is actually a vibrant orange colour and not red as pictured. I actually prefer the orange with the blue/teal colour of the hoodie! It looks great
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Carhartt always fits a bit large. It came as expected. I saw the same one in Marks Work Warehouse for about the same price, only they didn't have his size in store.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews:
Just got it in the mail today and is an authentic Carhartt sweater. Exact same one you'll find in the stores. I love how one post claims it's a knockoff simply because its cheaper Amazon.

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Absolutely perfect!! Exactly as described, great price and I will be ordering again! I have purchased the same identical item from a local store in the past for a much higher price and was beyond happy to find the same item online.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Absolutely perfect!! Exactly as described, great price and I will be ordering again! I have purchased the same identical item from a local store in the past for a much higher price and was beyond happy to find the same item online.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: These sweaters are carhartt knockoffs, and look very cheap. Asked for a refund multiple times and recieved nothing back..... What a waste of time.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: I love all my Carhartt gear, I have 8-10 hoodies, 7-8 long sleeve T’s, 10-12 short sleeve t’s and 3 jackets... my only complaint with this sweater is the picture makes it look considerably lighter then it is in person and I already have this dark blue.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Love this sweater for my husband, but it for much larger than regular sizes. Ordered a xl as he usually fits all xl’s but this was huge. Like it a whole size larger huge. The quality was great but just wish the size was more true to regular sizing. I would recommend sizing down.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess

product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: These sweaters are carhartt knockoffs, and look very cheap. Asked for a refund multiple times and recieved nothing back..... What a waste of time.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: I love all my Carhartt gear, I have 8-10 hoodies, 7-8 long sleeve T’s, 10-12 short sleeve t’s and 3 jackets... my only complaint with this sweater is the picture makes it look considerably lighter then it is in person and I already have this dark blue.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Love this sweater for my husband, but it for much larger than regular sizes. Ordered a xl as he usually fits all xl’s but this was huge. Like it a whole size larger huge. The quality was great but just wish the size was more true to regular sizing. I would recommend sizing down.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Fantastic sweatshirt. I purchased as a gift for my brother-in-law and he loved it. One thing to note is that the writing on the arm is actually a vibrant orange colour and not red as pictured. I actually prefer the orange with the blue/teal colour of the hoodie! It looks great
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Carhartt always fits a bit large. It came as expected. I saw the same one in Marks Work Warehouse for about the same price, only they didn't have his size in store.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews:
Just got it in the mail today and is an authentic Carhartt sweater. Exact same one you'll find in the stores. I love how one post claims it's a knockoff simply because its cheaper Amazon.

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Fantastic sweatshirt. I purchased as a gift for my brother-in-law and he loved it. One thing to note is that the writing on the arm is actually a vibrant orange colour and not red as pictured. I actually prefer the orange with the blue/teal colour of the hoodie! It looks great
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Carhartt always fits a bit large. It came as expected. I saw the same one in Marks Work Warehouse for about the same price, only they didn't have his size in store.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews:
Just got it in the mail today and is an authentic Carhartt sweater. Exact same one you'll find in the stores. I love how one post claims it's a knockoff simply because its cheaper Amazon.

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Absolutely perfect!! Exactly as described, great price and I will be ordering again! I have purchased the same identical item from a local store in the past for a much higher price and was beyond happy to find the same item online.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Absolutely perfect!! Exactly as described, great price and I will be ordering again! I have purchased the same identical item from a local store in the past for a much higher price and was beyond happy to find the same item online.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: These sweaters are carhartt knockoffs, and look very cheap. Asked for a refund multiple times and recieved nothing back..... What a waste of time.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: I love all my Carhartt gear, I have 8-10 hoodies, 7-8 long sleeve T’s, 10-12 short sleeve t’s and 3 jackets... my only complaint with this sweater is the picture makes it look considerably lighter then it is in person and I already have this dark blue.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Love this sweater for my husband, but it for much larger than regular sizes. Ordered a xl as he usually fits all xl’s but this was huge. Like it a whole size larger huge. The quality was great but just wish the size was more true to regular sizing. I would recommend sizing down.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess

product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: These sweaters are carhartt knockoffs, and look very cheap. Asked for a refund multiple times and recieved nothing back..... What a waste of time.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: I love all my Carhartt gear, I have 8-10 hoodies, 7-8 long sleeve T’s, 10-12 short sleeve t’s and 3 jackets... my only complaint with this sweater is the picture makes it look considerably lighter then it is in person and I already have this dark blue.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Love this sweater for my husband, but it for much larger than regular sizes. Ordered a xl as he usually fits all xl’s but this was huge. Like it a whole size larger huge. The quality was great but just wish the size was more true to regular sizing. I would recommend sizing down.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Fantastic sweatshirt. I purchased as a gift for my brother-in-law and he loved it. One thing to note is that the writing on the arm is actually a vibrant orange colour and not red as pictured. I actually prefer the orange with the blue/teal colour of the hoodie! It looks great
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Carhartt always fits a bit large. It came as expected. I saw the same one in Marks Work Warehouse for about the same price, only they didn't have his size in store.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews:
Just got it in the mail today and is an authentic Carhartt sweater. Exact same one you'll find in the stores. I love how one post claims it's a knockoff simply because its cheaper Amazon.

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Fantastic sweatshirt. I purchased as a gift for my brother-in-law and he loved it. One thing to note is that the writing on the arm is actually a vibrant orange colour and not red as pictured. I actually prefer the orange with the blue/teal colour of the hoodie! It looks great
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Carhartt always fits a bit large. It came as expected. I saw the same one in Marks Work Warehouse for about the same price, only they didn't have his size in store.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews:
Just got it in the mail today and is an authentic Carhartt sweater. Exact same one you'll find in the stores. I love how one post claims it's a knockoff simply because its cheaper Amazon.

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Absolutely perfect!! Exactly as described, great price and I will be ordering again! I have purchased the same identical item from a local store in the past for a much higher price and was beyond happy to find the same item online.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Absolutely perfect!! Exactly as described, great price and I will be ordering again! I have purchased the same identical item from a local store in the past for a much higher price and was beyond happy to find the same item online.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: These sweaters are carhartt knockoffs, and look very cheap. Asked for a refund multiple times and recieved nothing back..... What a waste of time.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: I love all my Carhartt gear, I have 8-10 hoodies, 7-8 long sleeve T’s, 10-12 short sleeve t’s and 3 jackets... my only complaint with this sweater is the picture makes it look considerably lighter then it is in person and I already have this dark blue.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Love this sweater for my husband, but it for much larger than regular sizes. Ordered a xl as he usually fits all xl’s but this was huge. Like it a whole size larger huge. The quality was great but just wish the size was more true to regular sizing. I would recommend sizing down.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess

product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: These sweaters are carhartt knockoffs, and look very cheap. Asked for a refund multiple times and recieved nothing back..... What a waste of time.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: I love all my Carhartt gear, I have 8-10 hoodies, 7-8 long sleeve T’s, 10-12 short sleeve t’s and 3 jackets... my only complaint with this sweater is the picture makes it look considerably lighter then it is in person and I already have this dark blue.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Love this sweater for my husband, but it for much larger than regular sizes. Ordered a xl as he usually fits all xl’s but this was huge. Like it a whole size larger huge. The quality was great but just wish the size was more true to regular sizing. I would recommend sizing down.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Fantastic sweatshirt. I purchased as a gift for my brother-in-law and he loved it. One thing to note is that the writing on the arm is actually a vibrant orange colour and not red as pictured. I actually prefer the orange with the blue/teal colour of the hoodie! It looks great
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Carhartt always fits a bit large. It came as expected. I saw the same one in Marks Work Warehouse for about the same price, only they didn't have his size in store.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews:
Just got it in the mail today and is an authentic Carhartt sweater. Exact same one you'll find in the stores. I love how one post claims it's a knockoff simply because its cheaper Amazon.

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Fantastic sweatshirt. I purchased as a gift for my brother-in-law and he loved it. One thing to note is that the writing on the arm is actually a vibrant orange colour and not red as pictured. I actually prefer the orange with the blue/teal colour of the hoodie! It looks great
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Carhartt always fits a bit large. It came as expected. I saw the same one in Marks Work Warehouse for about the same price, only they didn't have his size in store.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews:
Just got it in the mail today and is an authentic Carhartt sweater. Exact same one you'll find in the stores. I love how one post claims it's a knockoff simply because its cheaper Amazon.

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Absolutely perfect!! Exactly as described, great price and I will be ordering again! I have purchased the same identical item from a local store in the past for a much higher price and was beyond happy to find the same item online.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Absolutely perfect!! Exactly as described, great price and I will be ordering again! I have purchased the same identical item from a local store in the past for a much higher price and was beyond happy to find the same item online.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: These sweaters are carhartt knockoffs, and look very cheap. Asked for a refund multiple times and recieved nothing back..... What a waste of time.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: I love all my Carhartt gear, I have 8-10 hoodies, 7-8 long sleeve T’s, 10-12 short sleeve t’s and 3 jackets... my only complaint with this sweater is the picture makes it look considerably lighter then it is in person and I already have this dark blue.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Love this sweater for my husband, but it for much larger than regular sizes. Ordered a xl as he usually fits all xl’s but this was huge. Like it a whole size larger huge. The quality was great but just wish the size was more true to regular sizing. I would recommend sizing down.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess

product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: These sweaters are carhartt knockoffs, and look very cheap. Asked for a refund multiple times and recieved nothing back..... What a waste of time.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: I love all my Carhartt gear, I have 8-10 hoodies, 7-8 long sleeve T’s, 10-12 short sleeve t’s and 3 jackets... my only complaint with this sweater is the picture makes it look considerably lighter then it is in person and I already have this dark blue.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Love this sweater for my husband, but it for much larger than regular sizes. Ordered a xl as he usually fits all xl’s but this was huge. Like it a whole size larger huge. The quality was great but just wish the size was more true to regular sizing. I would recommend sizing down.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Fantastic sweatshirt. I purchased as a gift for my brother-in-law and he loved it. One thing to note is that the writing on the arm is actually a vibrant orange colour and not red as pictured. I actually prefer the orange with the blue/teal colour of the hoodie! It looks great
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Carhartt always fits a bit large. It came as expected. I saw the same one in Marks Work Warehouse for about the same price, only they didn't have his size in store.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews:
Just got it in the mail today and is an authentic Carhartt sweater. Exact same one you'll find in the stores. I love how one post claims it's a knockoff simply because its cheaper Amazon.

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Fantastic sweatshirt. I purchased as a gift for my brother-in-law and he loved it. One thing to note is that the writing on the arm is actually a vibrant orange colour and not red as pictured. I actually prefer the orange with the blue/teal colour of the hoodie! It looks great
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Carhartt always fits a bit large. It came as expected. I saw the same one in Marks Work Warehouse for about the same price, only they didn't have his size in store.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews:
Just got it in the mail today and is an authentic Carhartt sweater. Exact same one you'll find in the stores. I love how one post claims it's a knockoff simply because its cheaper Amazon.

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Absolutely perfect!! Exactly as described, great price and I will be ordering again! I have purchased the same identical item from a local store in the past for a much higher price and was beyond happy to find the same item online.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Absolutely perfect!! Exactly as described, great price and I will be ordering again! I have purchased the same identical item from a local store in the past for a much higher price and was beyond happy to find the same item online.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: These sweaters are carhartt knockoffs, and look very cheap. Asked for a refund multiple times and recieved nothing back..... What a waste of time.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: I love all my Carhartt gear, I have 8-10 hoodies, 7-8 long sleeve T’s, 10-12 short sleeve t’s and 3 jackets... my only complaint with this sweater is the picture makes it look considerably lighter then it is in person and I already have this dark blue.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Love this sweater for my husband, but it for much larger than regular sizes. Ordered a xl as he usually fits all xl’s but this was huge. Like it a whole size larger huge. The quality was great but just wish the size was more true to regular sizing. I would recommend sizing down.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess

product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: These sweaters are carhartt knockoffs, and look very cheap. Asked for a refund multiple times and recieved nothing back..... What a waste of time.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: I love all my Carhartt gear, I have 8-10 hoodies, 7-8 long sleeve T’s, 10-12 short sleeve t’s and 3 jackets... my only complaint with this sweater is the picture makes it look considerably lighter then it is in person and I already have this dark blue.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Love this sweater for my husband, but it for much larger than regular sizes. Ordered a xl as he usually fits all xl’s but this was huge. Like it a whole size larger huge. The quality was great but just wish the size was more true to regular sizing. I would recommend sizing down.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Fantastic sweatshirt. I purchased as a gift for my brother-in-law and he loved it. One thing to note is that the writing on the arm is actually a vibrant orange colour and not red as pictured. I actually prefer the orange with the blue/teal colour of the hoodie! It looks great
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Carhartt always fits a bit large. It came as expected. I saw the same one in Marks Work Warehouse for about the same price, only they didn't have his size in store.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews:
Just got it in the mail today and is an authentic Carhartt sweater. Exact same one you'll find in the stores. I love how one post claims it's a knockoff simply because its cheaper Amazon.

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Fantastic sweatshirt. I purchased as a gift for my brother-in-law and he loved it. One thing to note is that the writing on the arm is actually a vibrant orange colour and not red as pictured. I actually prefer the orange with the blue/teal colour of the hoodie! It looks great
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Carhartt always fits a bit large. It came as expected. I saw the same one in Marks Work Warehouse for about the same price, only they didn't have his size in store.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews:
Just got it in the mail today and is an authentic Carhartt sweater. Exact same one you'll find in the stores. I love how one post claims it's a knockoff simply because its cheaper Amazon.

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Absolutely perfect!! Exactly as described, great price and I will be ordering again! I have purchased the same identical item from a local store in the past for a much higher price and was beyond happy to find the same item online.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Absolutely perfect!! Exactly as described, great price and I will be ordering again! I have purchased the same identical item from a local store in the past for a much higher price and was beyond happy to find the same item online.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: These sweaters are carhartt knockoffs, and look very cheap. Asked for a refund multiple times and recieved nothing back..... What a waste of time.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: I love all my Carhartt gear, I have 8-10 hoodies, 7-8 long sleeve T’s, 10-12 short sleeve t’s and 3 jackets... my only complaint with this sweater is the picture makes it look considerably lighter then it is in person and I already have this dark blue.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Love this sweater for my husband, but it for much larger than regular sizes. Ordered a xl as he usually fits all xl’s but this was huge. Like it a whole size larger huge. The quality was great but just wish the size was more true to regular sizing. I would recommend sizing down.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess

product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: These sweaters are carhartt knockoffs, and look very cheap. Asked for a refund multiple times and recieved nothing back..... What a waste of time.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: I love all my Carhartt gear, I have 8-10 hoodies, 7-8 long sleeve T’s, 10-12 short sleeve t’s and 3 jackets... my only complaint with this sweater is the picture makes it look considerably lighter then it is in person and I already have this dark blue.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Love this sweater for my husband, but it for much larger than regular sizes. Ordered a xl as he usually fits all xl’s but this was huge. Like it a whole size larger huge. The quality was great but just wish the size was more true to regular sizing. I would recommend sizing down.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Fantastic sweatshirt. I purchased as a gift for my brother-in-law and he loved it. One thing to note is that the writing on the arm is actually a vibrant orange colour and not red as pictured. I actually prefer the orange with the blue/teal colour of the hoodie! It looks great
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Carhartt always fits a bit large. It came as expected. I saw the same one in Marks Work Warehouse for about the same price, only they didn't have his size in store.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews:
Just got it in the mail today and is an authentic Carhartt sweater. Exact same one you'll find in the stores. I love how one post claims it's a knockoff simply because its cheaper Amazon.

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Fantastic sweatshirt. I purchased as a gift for my brother-in-law and he loved it. One thing to note is that the writing on the arm is actually a vibrant orange colour and not red as pictured. I actually prefer the orange with the blue/teal colour of the hoodie! It looks great
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Carhartt always fits a bit large. It came as expected. I saw the same one in Marks Work Warehouse for about the same price, only they didn't have his size in store.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews:
Just got it in the mail today and is an authentic Carhartt sweater. Exact same one you'll find in the stores. I love how one post claims it's a knockoff simply because its cheaper Amazon.

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Absolutely perfect!! Exactly as described, great price and I will be ordering again! I have purchased the same identical item from a local store in the past for a much higher price and was beyond happy to find the same item online.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Absolutely perfect!! Exactly as described, great price and I will be ordering again! I have purchased the same identical item from a local store in the past for a much higher price and was beyond happy to find the same item online.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: These sweaters are carhartt knockoffs, and look very cheap. Asked for a refund multiple times and recieved nothing back..... What a waste of time.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: I love all my Carhartt gear, I have 8-10 hoodies, 7-8 long sleeve T’s, 10-12 short sleeve t’s and 3 jackets... my only complaint with this sweater is the picture makes it look considerably lighter then it is in person and I already have this dark blue.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Love this sweater for my husband, but it for much larger than regular sizes. Ordered a xl as he usually fits all xl’s but this was huge. Like it a whole size larger huge. The quality was great but just wish the size was more true to regular sizing. I would recommend sizing down.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess

product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: These sweaters are carhartt knockoffs, and look very cheap. Asked for a refund multiple times and recieved nothing back..... What a waste of time.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: I love all my Carhartt gear, I have 8-10 hoodies, 7-8 long sleeve T’s, 10-12 short sleeve t’s and 3 jackets... my only complaint with this sweater is the picture makes it look considerably lighter then it is in person and I already have this dark blue.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Love this sweater for my husband, but it for much larger than regular sizes. Ordered a xl as he usually fits all xl’s but this was huge. Like it a whole size larger huge. The quality was great but just wish the size was more true to regular sizing. I would recommend sizing down.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Fantastic sweatshirt. I purchased as a gift for my brother-in-law and he loved it. One thing to note is that the writing on the arm is actually a vibrant orange colour and not red as pictured. I actually prefer the orange with the blue/teal colour of the hoodie! It looks great
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Carhartt always fits a bit large. It came as expected. I saw the same one in Marks Work Warehouse for about the same price, only they didn't have his size in store.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews:
Just got it in the mail today and is an authentic Carhartt sweater. Exact same one you'll find in the stores. I love how one post claims it's a knockoff simply because its cheaper Amazon.

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Fantastic sweatshirt. I purchased as a gift for my brother-in-law and he loved it. One thing to note is that the writing on the arm is actually a vibrant orange colour and not red as pictured. I actually prefer the orange with the blue/teal colour of the hoodie! It looks great
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Carhartt always fits a bit large. It came as expected. I saw the same one in Marks Work Warehouse for about the same price, only they didn't have his size in store.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews:
Just got it in the mail today and is an authentic Carhartt sweater. Exact same one you'll find in the stores. I love how one post claims it's a knockoff simply because its cheaper Amazon.

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Absolutely perfect!! Exactly as described, great price and I will be ordering again! I have purchased the same identical item from a local store in the past for a much higher price and was beyond happy to find the same item online.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Absolutely perfect!! Exactly as described, great price and I will be ordering again! I have purchased the same identical item from a local store in the past for a much higher price and was beyond happy to find the same item online.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: These sweaters are carhartt knockoffs, and look very cheap. Asked for a refund multiple times and recieved nothing back..... What a waste of time.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: I love all my Carhartt gear, I have 8-10 hoodies, 7-8 long sleeve T’s, 10-12 short sleeve t’s and 3 jackets... my only complaint with this sweater is the picture makes it look considerably lighter then it is in person and I already have this dark blue.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Love this sweater for my husband, but it for much larger than regular sizes. Ordered a xl as he usually fits all xl’s but this was huge. Like it a whole size larger huge. The quality was great but just wish the size was more true to regular sizing. I would recommend sizing down.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess

product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: These sweaters are carhartt knockoffs, and look very cheap. Asked for a refund multiple times and recieved nothing back..... What a waste of time.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: I love all my Carhartt gear, I have 8-10 hoodies, 7-8 long sleeve T’s, 10-12 short sleeve t’s and 3 jackets... my only complaint with this sweater is the picture makes it look considerably lighter then it is in person and I already have this dark blue.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Love this sweater for my husband, but it for much larger than regular sizes. Ordered a xl as he usually fits all xl’s but this was huge. Like it a whole size larger huge. The quality was great but just wish the size was more true to regular sizing. I would recommend sizing down.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Fantastic sweatshirt. I purchased as a gift for my brother-in-law and he loved it. One thing to note is that the writing on the arm is actually a vibrant orange colour and not red as pictured. I actually prefer the orange with the blue/teal colour of the hoodie! It looks great
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Carhartt always fits a bit large. It came as expected. I saw the same one in Marks Work Warehouse for about the same price, only they didn't have his size in store.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews:
Just got it in the mail today and is an authentic Carhartt sweater. Exact same one you'll find in the stores. I love how one post claims it's a knockoff simply because its cheaper Amazon.

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Fantastic sweatshirt. I purchased as a gift for my brother-in-law and he loved it. One thing to note is that the writing on the arm is actually a vibrant orange colour and not red as pictured. I actually prefer the orange with the blue/teal colour of the hoodie! It looks great
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Carhartt always fits a bit large. It came as expected. I saw the same one in Marks Work Warehouse for about the same price, only they didn't have his size in store.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews:
Just got it in the mail today and is an authentic Carhartt sweater. Exact same one you'll find in the stores. I love how one post claims it's a knockoff simply because its cheaper Amazon.

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Absolutely perfect!! Exactly as described, great price and I will be ordering again! I have purchased the same identical item from a local store in the past for a much higher price and was beyond happy to find the same item online.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Absolutely perfect!! Exactly as described, great price and I will be ordering again! I have purchased the same identical item from a local store in the past for a much higher price and was beyond happy to find the same item online.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: These sweaters are carhartt knockoffs, and look very cheap. Asked for a refund multiple times and recieved nothing back..... What a waste of time.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: I love all my Carhartt gear, I have 8-10 hoodies, 7-8 long sleeve T’s, 10-12 short sleeve t’s and 3 jackets... my only complaint with this sweater is the picture makes it look considerably lighter then it is in person and I already have this dark blue.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Love this sweater for my husband, but it for much larger than regular sizes. Ordered a xl as he usually fits all xl’s but this was huge. Like it a whole size larger huge. The quality was great but just wish the size was more true to regular sizing. I would recommend sizing down.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess

product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: These sweaters are carhartt knockoffs, and look very cheap. Asked for a refund multiple times and recieved nothing back..... What a waste of time.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: I love all my Carhartt gear, I have 8-10 hoodies, 7-8 long sleeve T’s, 10-12 short sleeve t’s and 3 jackets... my only complaint with this sweater is the picture makes it look considerably lighter then it is in person and I already have this dark blue.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Love this sweater for my husband, but it for much larger than regular sizes. Ordered a xl as he usually fits all xl’s but this was huge. Like it a whole size larger huge. The quality was great but just wish the size was more true to regular sizing. I would recommend sizing down.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Fantastic sweatshirt. I purchased as a gift for my brother-in-law and he loved it. One thing to note is that the writing on the arm is actually a vibrant orange colour and not red as pictured. I actually prefer the orange with the blue/teal colour of the hoodie! It looks great
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Carhartt always fits a bit large. It came as expected. I saw the same one in Marks Work Warehouse for about the same price, only they didn't have his size in store.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews:
Just got it in the mail today and is an authentic Carhartt sweater. Exact same one you'll find in the stores. I love how one post claims it's a knockoff simply because its cheaper Amazon.

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.

reviews: Purchased for my son (13) who has mentioned how warm it is, trying to get out of wearing a coat (in a Canadian winter? Get real) it was worth a try I guess
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Fantastic sweatshirt. I purchased as a gift for my brother-in-law and he loved it. One thing to note is that the writing on the arm is actually a vibrant orange colour and not red as pictured. I actually prefer the orange with the blue/teal colour of the hoodie! It looks great
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Carhartt always fits a bit large. It came as expected. I saw the same one in Marks Work Warehouse for about the same price, only they didn't have his size in store.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews:
Just got it in the mail today and is an authentic Carhartt sweater. Exact same one you'll find in the stores. I love how one post claims it's a knockoff simply because its cheaper Amazon.

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Absolutely perfect!! Exactly as described, great price and I will be ordering again! I have purchased the same identical item from a local store in the past for a much higher price and was beyond happy to find the same item online.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

Fits perfectly and is very comfortable, exactly what I expected.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Authentic Carhartt Hoodie. Thick, warm, soft, durable. Perfect for work and canadian winters. I'm a 5'5, 50kg woman and I bought a small. You have space to move in it but some may find it a bit large, I don't. I love it, I have few of them. I recommend it.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

review_title: Great hoodie; fits large and color a bit off
reviews:
Love it!
Order a size down though, even then, it's still roomy. Keep that in mind.

Color is a bit off on mine (Henna Heather). A bit more orange/rust colored than pictured.
Also, the logo on the sleeve is a very dark blue, almost black; not grey.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: Absolutely perfect!! Exactly as described, great price and I will be ordering again! I have purchased the same identical item from a local store in the past for a much higher price and was beyond happy to find the same item online.

reviews: I bought 2 of these for my husband and brother in law for Christmas. It wasn’t until after I purchased that I read the reviews. Not very promising. But I’m presently surprised. The grey hoodie was in perfect condition, about the same thickness as a regular carhartt hoodies. The navy blue one did have a small stain on the pocket that we can’t seem to get out. But all in all, pleasantly surprised considering past reviews.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt

reviews: the color was more orange than i though it would be and and feels a little thinner maybe and fits a little smaller compared to the blue and brown ones i have.But it is a nice contrast and is good quality and i would buy it again

reviews: I have two other carhartt hoodies that I absolutely love. My heather grey hoody was made in mexico. But this black one was made in Honduras. I'm not sure why, but the hood on the sweater is considerably smaller than my other hoods and puts pressure on my head. It is disproportional to the rest of the hoody. Even though it's a large tall, and in the color I want, the fit is very poor. I am surprised carhartt let this slide. I am returning this item.

review_title: Good Quality, Great Fit & Looks Good On My Husband!
reviews: I purchased the Black, Carhartt Men's Hoodie, in size xxl, for my husband, as a Christmas Gift. I really like that it's made really well & is made with quality material. It fits my husband well, even with layers underneath & looks good on him to. He likes the size and placement of the logo's & all of the above. I paid extra for gift wrap, it came in a really durable, awesome silver gift bag with matching ribbons at the top & it also came with a really nice gift card, inside they printed what I wanted it to say, smilies and all. It came a little late, due to customs being backed up, as it was shipped from an American warehouse, as they were sold out in Canada. Great Product & I will be purchasing 2 more. I will recommend this product because of the reason's listed above . I also waited until it went on sale, I purchased mine for just under $58.00 Canadian. I Give this Item 5 Stars!
product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Sleeve Logo Hooded Sweatshirt
